definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: In the big fire, some trees survived.
sentences.chinese: 大火之後，仍有一些樹木殘存。

sentences.english: The giant panda is one of the surviving ancient animals.
sentences.chinese: 大熊貓是一種殘存的古動物。

sentences.english: Some of the sculptures and frieze sections survived and can be seen today at the British Museum in London, England.
sentences.chinese: 殘存的部分雕刻和材料現在保存在英國大英博物館裏。

sentences.english: The remaining protectionist barriers only detract from those huge successes.
sentences.chinese: 殘存的保護主義壁壘只會損害這些卓著成果。

sentences.english: Revolutionary forces have fought Gadhafi's men street by street, cornering the last vestiges of the old regime to that last district.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲舊政權的殘存勢力也在這個城市最終走投無路。

sentences.english: The Ainu settlers in Hokkaido are the last remnant of a prehistoric race.
sentences.chinese: 北海道的阿伊努人是史前某個種族的最後殘存者。

sentences.english: Each white dwarf is a burned up, dying star like the sun.
sentences.chinese: 每個白矮星都是類似於太陽燃燼後殘存的恆星。

sentences.english: Remove theird discard the mask after use. Gently cletheirse fair-cone with water.
sentences.chinese: 面膜使用後請扔掉，並用清水輕輕洗淨面部殘存精華。

sentences.english: Clothing, will inevitably leave the remnants of washing liquid, laundry detergent to use much more.
sentences.chinese: 衣物上難免會留有殘存的洗滌液，洗衣劑用得多。

sentences.english: Surviving Death Eaters will have to be brought to justice or reintegrated into magical society.
sentences.chinese: 那些殘存的食死徒要麼繩之於法要麼歸入魔法社會。

sentences.english: Gib along the edge of the ice caps ice caps, surviving form the dispersed of ice.
sentences.chinese: 基博的冰蓋沿冰蓋邊緣殘存下來，形成分散的大冰塊。

sentences.english: The Ainu settlers in Hokkaido are the last remnant of a prehistoric race.
sentences.chinese: 人是史前某個種族的最後殘存者。

sentences.english: Microscopically, the aortic atheromatous plaque is thicker than the remaining media at the right.
sentences.chinese: 動脈粥樣斑塊比右邊殘存的動脈中膜要厚。

sentences.english: The proposal on dealing with the residual LPG in deodorization tower and conservation of molecular sieve is given.
sentences.chinese: 對脫臭塔內殘存液的處理和分子篩的儲存提出了建議。

sentences.english: The remains of snow from the severe winter storm that hit last month, made the scenery extra pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 上月剛過去的寒冬積雪殘存，令景緻更加美麗。

sentences.english: There was only a little residual solvent and detergent left after treatment.
sentences.chinese: 處理後有機溶劑和去污劑殘存量極少。

definition: to vanish gradually/to disappear/to fade out
